title: Marriage is Like Maintaining a Garden
itunes:summary:
Just like a garden needs water, your marriage needs simple acts of love in order to thrive. John, Erin and Greg explain how they've seen little things help their marriages. They'll also offer some encouragement to couples who are struggling to love each other. Featuring Dr. Marcus Warner and Pastor Chris Coursey.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "The 4 Habits of Joy-Filled Marriages" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-08-31?refcd=1134502

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/marriage-is-like-maintaining-a-garden/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
